title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up
descriptions: Get ready for a fun-filled family game night with the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game! This fast-paced game is perfect for players ages 8 and up, featuring two exciting decks of cards - one for kids and one for adults. With over 1,000 guess words and varying forbidden words, the gameplay is always fresh and unpredictable. The included squeaker and one-minute timer add an extra level of excitement to the game. The objective is simple - get your teammates to guess the words without saying any forbidden words. But be careful, because saying a forbidden word means a point for the opposing team! With 260 cards in total and a winning condition of the most points, this game is sure to bring out the competitive spirit in everyone. Don't miss out on the fun - bring home the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game today!

With a winning condition of most points, this game is sure to bring out the friendly competition in your family. Don't miss out on the fun - grab the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game and make your game nights unforgettable!
